Description: Gain a barrier worth 25% of your missing health and block all debuffs for 1 second. 45 second cooldown. Can activate while stunned
After using an ability, your next basic attack deals 15% of the target's max health as damage with 50% lifesteal. Max 400 damage vs non-heroes. 1.5 second cooldown
Every other attack deals 70% of your crystal power as bonus damage
Activate to maim nearby enemies, lowering their attack speed by 50% of their total for 4 seconds, in a 4 meter range. 20 second cooldown
Restores 40HP whenever you kill a minion or monster (85 with melee attacks)
Your basic attacks shred 5% of the targets armour for 3 seconds. Max 8 stacks
Restores 30HP whenever you kill a minion or a monster (60 with melee attacks)

Gain 10 Weapon Power for every 140 damage done to enemy heroes, +5/10 (Melee/Ranged) damage needed for each stack thereafter. 20 stacks max. Decays 3 stacks per second after you've stopped attacking for 2.5 seconds
Amplify all crystal damage by 4% for each second you are attacking enemy heroes. After 4 seconds, you lose one stack per second. Max 9 stacks
Amplify crystal power by 30%
Activate and target yourself to place a scout trap. Target elsewhere to fire a flare. 5 second cooldown. 3 charges max. 20 seconds per charge
Trigger a teamwide reflex block. 45 second cooldown
Consume to temporarily gain 20-60 crystal power, 10-25% cooldown speed, and 10-30 armour & shield based on your level. Lasts 2.5 minutes. Can only have one infusion at a time

Activate and after a brief delay, nearby enemies are marked for the next 3 seconds. The next basic attack from an ally consumes the mark, slowing by 30% for 2 seconds and dealing 100 bonus crystal damage. 10 second cooldown. 2 charges max. 25 seconds per charge
The last ability to be put on cooldown is refreshed (115% of ability's cooldown + 10 seconds cooldown)
Your next 600-1200 (level 1-12) points of crystal damage to enemy heroes has 25% lifesteal, recharges over 40 seconds
Consume to reveal an area for 5 seconds. Scout traps seen within this area are permanently revealed. 5 second cooldown
Fire a flare. 5 second cooldown. Max 2 charges. 20 seconds per charge

Regenerate 2.5% of your missing health per second whenever you are out of combat with enemy heroes for 5 seconds. Activate to heal you and nearby allies for 2 HP for each missing % of health per second for 3 seconds. 60 second cooldown
Dealing crystal damage will slow for 1.5 seconds, target(s) may not be affected by Frostburn for 2 seconds afterwards. Slows by 10% +1% per 10 crystal power. Max 35% slow
Passive: Travel Boots. Passive: Move Speed +0.5. Activate to sprint for 3 seconds. 50 second cooldown
Consume to restore 80 HP and 40 energy instantly, then 200 HP and 65 energy over 25 seconds
When a nearby ally kills a jungle monster or a large lane minion, you and your ally heal for 75 HP and 10 energy each
Passive: Move Speed +0.6. Passive: Travel Boots. Activate to sprint for 2 seconds. 60 second cooldown. Damaging heroes resets the cooldown to 12 seconds if it is above it
Regenerate 2.5% of your missing health per second whenever you are out of combat with enemy heroes for 5 seconds
Consume to empower nearby friendly minions for 60 seconds and friendly jungle bosses for 30 seconds. They are granted 40% increased famage, 120 armour, 60 shield, and 0.5 increased move speed
After buying this item, your next attack on an enemy hero will crit.

Activate to fire a blast at an enemy hero, which explodes shortly after hitting its target. This item silences the target for 4 seconds and deals 50-100 + 15 % of max health in crystal damage. 35 second cooldown
Every 3 basic attacks will apply a mortal wound for 2 seconds. Restores 40HP whenever you kill a minion or monster (85 with melee attacks)
Activate to grant a 120 health barrier to nearby allied heroes for 2 seconds. 5 second cooldown. 2 charges max. 15 seconds per charge
Gain a barrier worth 25% of your missing health and block all debuffs for 1 second. 45 second cooldown. Can activate while stunned
Consume to place a trap at your feet. It will grant vision and will explode on contact with enemy heroes after a short delay. Deals splash damage and reveals affected enemies for 5 seconds
Restores 40HP whenever you kill a minion or monster (85 with melee attacks). Your next 600-1200 (level1-12) points of damage to enemy heroes has +25% lifesteal, recharges over 40 seconds
For the next 4 seconds (6 if you are melee) your basic attacks will slow enemy heroes by 40% for 1.4 seconds. 15 second cooldown
Taking 20% of your health in damage over 1.5 seconds fortifies your remaining health for 1.5 seconds. 30 second cooldown
Move Speed +0.4. Activate to sprint for 2 seconds. 150 second cooldown
15% damage to heroes
15% damage to heroes
Every 6 seconds, your next basic attack will deal 180 bonus Weapon Power damage
Passive: Move Speed +0.4. Passive: Move Speed +1 when not in combat. Activate to sprint for 2 seconds. 90 second cooldown
Passive: Move Speed +0.4. Passive: Travel Boots. Grant a sprint to all nearby teammates for 2 seconds. 60 second cooldown
Consume to temporarily gain 20-60 weapon power, 5-15% attack speed, and 10-30 armour & shield based on your level. Lasts 2.5 minutes. Can only have one infusion at a time
